thumb.name: Special Time of Year
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGreetings%3Cbr%3Eof the Season%3Cbr%3Efrom Willis Flowers%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBest wishes%3Cbr%3Eat this %3Cbr%3Especial time%3Cbr%3Eof year.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Busy Schedule
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EFrom the Desk of Chris Get up. go to work. sleep. Get up. go to work. sleep. Get up. go to work. sleep. Get up. go to work. sleep. Get up. go to work. sleep. Get up. go to work. sleep. Get up. go to work. sleep. Have a Merry Christmas! Get up. go to work%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ETake time out of your busy schedule to have a Merry Christmas.%3Cbr%3E
